title: Now That's Class
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bar with live music & events nightly. Offers food by ORALE Mexican Cuisine with some veg items. On Tuesday and Sunday a pop-up vegan operation. On Tuesday 9pm-12am serves vegan Cleveland cheese steaks, macaroni and cheese, wedge cut fries. On Sunday 3-6pm serves sandwich, sides, soup. Vegan food throughout the week (while supplies last) include: spinach & potato empanada & enchilada, chips and dip, coconut curried lentils, buffalo tofu with ranch, quesadilla, and enchilada. Has almond milk and vegan bloody mary.
